snippet.title: DC Universe Online - Sons of Trigon DLC 8 Launch Trailer - AVAILABLE NOW!
snippet.description:
In this new DLC, players must battle alongside Wonder Woman or her adversary, Circe, through a hellish Gotham City landscape to defeat Trigon. In addition to new high-level Duo, Alert and solo adventures, players now have access to new Legends PvP characters Donna Troy and Cheetah -- the first speedster on the Legends roster. Sons of Trigon introduces the game's 11th Power, Celestial, which is focused on healing and lets players create impressive combinations utilizing its Blessed or Cursed ability trees. 

PLay DCUO for FREE: http://dcuniverseonline.eu/
Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/dcuoeu
